name: Its Snowing
summary:
Yesterday was quite messy…

Its time to clean up.

name: IT Hell
summary: You are dead. Welcome to the IT Hell where you have to fight developers, critical bugs and your old equipment to make you way through it. Armed with your keyboard...and some guns, advance through different levels, upgrade your stats and reach the final boss!

name: Italian Brainrot: Arena
summary: Italian Brainrot: Arena is a multiplayer shooter in Unreal Engine 5 based on popular meme characters. Battle across multiple game modes with unique heroes and their special abilities. Customize loadouts and engage in fast-paced combat on various maps.

name: Itty Bitty Little Kitties
summary: Discover tiny little kittens hidden throughout magical forest scenes while enjoying relaxing music in a calming, zen-like atmosphere. Some are easy to find, but others can be real little devils, so be warned! For cat lovers and hidden object game enthusiasts alike ♡♡♡

name: It’s A Game Changer
summary: t's A Game Changer is a fast-paced, single-player microgame roguelike inspired by WarioWare. Cycle through diverse 2D and 3D microgames like dodging the rain and fishing. Choose upgrades, face rapid-fire challenges, and enjoy endless replayability. Created by a passionate indie developer.

name: I Think You Can
summary: There is a piece of wisdom: if you want to go fast – go alone. If you want to go far – go together!

name: It's Just A Prank
summary: It's Just A Prank is a first-person horror game about kids playing pranks on each other until a PRANK GOES WRONG. Experience suspense, fear and unexpected twists as a simple joke becomes a nightmare.

name: Item Frenzy
summary: Experience the Joy of Discovery in Item Frenzy!

name: It's Inside Me
summary: A short horror game experience made in 2 weeks for Pizza Doggy's Horror Jam #3.

name: It Makes for Painful Work
summary: In It Makes for Painful Work, you spend a few days as a contract worker in a late-capitalist hellscape where you'll do fun things such as customer service, review AI training data, and vote for slogans made by terrible AIs.

name: It's Quiz Time
summary: Go head to head with a brand new massive quiz game on PC! Featuring our devious AI game host Salli, take on It’s Quiz Time’s catalogue of over 25,000 questions. Face off against up to 8 players using your smartphone, go solo, or use Live Show mode to stream and play along with your audiences!

name: It's Always Happy at Chubby's
summary: Welcome to the night shift at Chubby’s, a 24/7 burger joint in the 90s. It's in the middle of nowhere, so you'll be mostly entirely alone. Just keep the store clean and occasionally serve the drive-thru counter. But whatever you do... always follow the rules.

name: Iter-8
summary: Welcome to the surface, ITER employee #8. Mine the Pillar, upgrade your tools, defend your base, reach the top... or die miserably. Each expendable worker pushes the mission forward - one glorious, replaceable iteration at a time.

name: It Tolls for Thee
summary: Raymond is trapped in a labyrinth of his own misgivings, painted in the remnants of a life he barely remembers. He must retain his sanity and make his way through an ever-shifting horror, all the while stalked by nightmarish creatures.

name: Its a Pirate-Game!
summary: A top-down minimalist pixel game about dodging pirates and their bullets!

name: It Takes a War
summary: Graphics! Guns! Glory! Get ready to drop into a devastatingly real depiction of the battlefield as you and your team take on a relentless foe. It Takes a War presents a new vision for the team-based tactical shooter genre.

name: It Could Happen to You
summary: Your peaceful holiday is interrupted when the small village you’re visiting in becomes terrorized by strange lights on the sky and enigmatic men in black. Some villagers have gone missing, everyone is afraid. Dive into a thrilling adventure with branching narrative and a unique visual style.

name: It Doesn't Have to Be Like This
summary: You play a gas station clerk working her shift on the day the earth is destroyed.

name: It's Kooky + Brawl Chess
summary: Look for quirks in the new hidden object game - It's Kooky! Are you ready to become a chess champion? Choose your hero and challenge other players in the game of kings.

name: It's Kooky + Cyber Protocol
summary: Look for quirks in the new hidden object game - It's Kooky! You can also try your puzzle solving skills in Cyber Protocol. An arcade puzzle game set in a Cyberpunk world. Why pick when you can have them both.

name: It Happened Here: If Walls Could Talk
Itazura Madness
summary: Itazura Madness is an first-person cartoony roguelike with 4 playable characters, 7 bosses, 100+ items and 60+ weapons

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No. 1
summary: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No. 1 is a fishing video game developed and released only in Japan for the Super Famicom on February 21, 1997 and updated for broadcast as eight different episodes on the Satellaview subsystem between April and November 1997.

name: I, the Forgotten One
summary: To defeat the rebel knights and stabilize the crown, you must journey through the most dangerous realm in the kingdom--your own wretched past.

name: It's another hack with Mario in it! Yay!
summary:
Help Mario to run and jump over stuff! Oh, and save some baby Yoshi eggs, too.
This hack has custom music and palletes, several simple ASM edits, some altered graphics and an original overworld. The demo contains the first four worlds and 41 available exits.

name: It Works: Electronics Repair Simulator
summary: Electronics Repair Simulator lets players operate their own electronics workshop where they diagnose and fix various devices including receivers, phones, and speakers. Players use authentic repair techniques like soldering and component replacement while managing a growing business. Through successful repairs, they earn money to expand their workshop and take on more complex projects.

name: IterativeCollapse
summary: ITERATIVECOLLAPSE is a narrative-driven, surreal psychological game about emotional loops, intrusive thoughts, and the painful persistence of existing inside your own mind.

name: It's Time
summary: Play as a young scientist who invents a time portal and uses it to bring back his dead wife. Soon, things become chaotic in his life. Make choices and help people as you progress. Decide whom to save, your family or friends. Your choices determine the ending.

name: It's All Over
summary: It's All Over is a single-player RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world featuring exploration across rich locations from bustling cities to desolated wastelands. You slept through the end of the world, and now it's time to uncover the truth behind The Burning Sky.

name: It's Just the End of the World, Love
summary: Two girlfriends celebrate halloween in the zombie apocalypse.

name: I Think
summary: One day, the programmer came up with an idea. If he could get AI to learn his diary, he could create himself in the electronic world.

name: It's Mealtime!
summary:
In The Mealtime is a physics multiplayer game where one or two teams of four players each work in a restaurant.

Plant, cook and serve plates while working together. Communication is crucial, but having fun is a must!

Stop crows and insects from eating your crops, prepare the dishes correctly and treat the customers nicely. With this, everything should be fine…right?

name: It Happened Here: Streaming Lives - Collector's Edition
summary: Fire up your audio equipment and get ready to unravel a chilling murder case in this heart-pounding mystery!

name: Ithya: Magic Studies
summary: Ithya: Magic Study is a cozy background app combined with productivity tools. Customize your room and relax with lofi or fantasy playlists in beautiful, hand-drawn environments. Perfect for a focused or creative session in a magical world.

name: It Mimics
summary: "It Mimics" is a short indie horror game heavily inspired by the original Slender The Eight Pages game. Step into the shoes of an unknown protagonist, collect the eight pages, and survive being followed by something lurking in the woods.

name: It's Winter
summary: Panel houses, snow, overcast sky, tiny kitchen, shabby staircase… It's Winter is an indie game which genre could be classified as sandbox, post-soviet, sad 3d, russian sadness. Nothing awaits you: there is no chance to get out, no room for adventures and breathtaking plot.

name: Ittle Dew 2+
summary:
An Unforgettable Adventure, Bursting With Puzzles and Oozing With Charm!

Sassy adventurer Ittle and her reluctant flying fox friend Tippsie are back for their greatest adventure ever! Stranded on yet another island and armed with a magical map, our heroes explore the three-dimensional landscape in search of valuable loot. Can they find the eight scattered pieces of the raft that could be their ticket home?

The island's mysterious residents range from cordial to downright hostile, so Ittle will need to use both force and her wits in equal measure. She'll have to solve a wide variety of puzzles in order to gain access to all of the island’s darkest corners and recover the booty stashed therein.

name: It Happened Here: A Storm is Brewing - Collector's Edition
It's A Promise
summary:
Erin has gotten used to the monotony of her life. But she still feels like something is missing. One day she is approached by a young woman named Ori who seems to know who she is. Erin doesn't remember her at all... Ori asks her out on a date and Erin finds herself saying yes.

How will the date go? Will Erin remember who Ori is? Will Ori find out that Erin doesn't remember her? Read to find out!

name: Ittle Dew
summary: Adventuress Ittle Dew and her sidekick Tippsie crash onto a strange island, filled with loot and mysterious inhabitants. It quickly dawns on the duo that this might become their biggest adventure yet. Ittle Dew boils down the classic adventure formula until there is only fun left.

name: Its Time To Meet God
summary: Its Time To Meet God is an interdimensional Ray Tracing shooter built from the ground up in Game maker studio. Fight and loot your way through interdimensional realms created by demi Gods, eldritch horrors, and Holy creatures to get to your loved ones who reside in the 3rd Heaven.

name: It Sprawls
summary: It Sprawls is a casual city builder where you try to create the biggest city possible on a forever expanding hexagonal map - place housing, industry, and infrastructure such as railroads, to keep the expansion going for as long as possible!

name: It Came from the Desert
summary:
It Came From the Desert is an action-adventure game that derives its inspiration from the many cult-horror B-Movies of the 50's and 60's, the 1954 film Them in particular. The player plays the part of Dr. Greg Bradley, a geologist and the newest resident in town. Eager to satisfy his scientific mind, Bradley sets out to examine the crash-site of a mysterious meteor, but what he finds is not at all what he had been looking for.

The game takes place all over Lizard Breath, and there are several different types of action / interaction. The adventure part of the game is very linear, guiding the player in a fairly set sequence of action sections. These include first-person bug shooting, scrolling overhead shooting, and a chase sequence.

name: It Steals
summary: AROUND EVERY CORNER. Face against stealthy antagonists that will take advantage of your expectations.

name: Itorah: Save the World Edition
summary:
The Save the World Edition contains Itorah as well as the official Soundtrack and Artbook.

Assemble Entertainment will donate 10% of the proceeds for every sold Save the World Edition to Survival International in support of indigenous people around the globe!

name: Itorah
summary: Discover Nahucan, a world inhabited by masked beings. You're Itorah, the only human in this strange place. Explore, fight and survive as you save Nahucan from its biggest threat, the black plague.

name: Itta
summary: A girl, her cat, her gun, and a search for answers. Featuring challenging bullet-hell style gameplay and a thoughtful narrative steeped in otherworldly mythology, Itta will test your skills and your resolve. At the end of the world, who else can you rely on but yourself?

name: It's Just A Jump!
summary: A reincarnation of the old school high difficult platform.

name: It Lurks in the Woods
summary: It Lurks in the Woods is a short first-person horror game based on French Canadian folklore.

name: It's a Long Way to the Top (If You Wanna Be a CEO)
summary: It's a Long Way To the Top (If You Wanna Be a CEO) is a modern 2D platformer, a dystopian adventure set in a corporation, all done in pixel art and with a nostalgic 80s / 90s vibe.

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1: Haru no Zenkoku Tournament
summary: A SoundLink game using "糸井重里のバス釣りNo.1 (Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1)". Only players who own the "Bass Tsuri No.1" game can participate in the event, otherwise the player participates in the garbage-picking-up event. The players compete for total weight of five basses. 100 higher-ranking winners qualify for the final tournament. Shigesato Itoi, bass professional Kawabe, Ogimori Jyunko Hagimori, and Kyoko Koizumi appeared on the event.

name: Item Collector: Pirates
summary: Item Collector - Pirates - Play through a huge amount of different levels with increasing difficulty and alternative exciting game modes. Bring you brain to the limit and find all the matching pairs!

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1: Aki no Zenkoku Tournament
summary: A SoundLink game using "糸井重里のバス釣りNo.1 (Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1)". Only players who own the "Bass Tsuri No.1" game can participate in the event, otherwise the player participates in the garbage-picking-up event. The players compete for total weight of five basses. 100 higher-ranking winners qualify for the final tournament. Shigesato Itoi, bass professional Kawabe, Ogimori Jyunko Hagimori, and Kyoko Koizumi appeared on the event.

name: It Takes a Tribe
summary: ITAT is a single-player strategy set in a harsh and mythical world before cities and civilization. Lead a tribe of hunter-gatherers to fulfil their destiny. Survive, explore, craft, perform rituals, design art and forge a cultural identity. What stories will your tribe tell?

name: Italy '90 Soccer
summary:
In the game, trying to predict the events of the 1990 World Cup held in Italy, you may choose a team to play soccer and to win the championship.

On the field in third person side-scrolling view you may control the player with the ball or the player nearest to the ball, moving him in eight directions, trying to get the ball, and performing the kick. Pressing the 'kick' key down will increase the power of the kick. The number of players on the field is unusual and consists of 7 players for each team including the goalkeeper.

The game is available for 1-8 players, and it has a slightly different range of computer AI levels, game speeds, match durations, and countries in Amiga/C64 versions.

name: It's time to get out from the solar system
summary: A game with a futuristic anti-utopian story — a hardcore space shooter with RPG elements.

name: It's Time, Your Majesty
summary: This is a DBG Game! By choosing various cards to add to the deck, your majesty needs to make wise decisions to cope with the effects of different years and dynastic changes. This huge and beautiful country is on your shoulder. Long live your majesty!

name: It's Not You, It's M.E
summary: A short narrative point-and-click about living with limited energy — and how even the smallest tasks can feel impossible.

name: ITRP: Volatile Vertex
summary: If you see a ledge, it means it has a reason for being there. A three-dimensional puzzle platformer in which you change the gravity in three axes. Walk on walls or stand on the ceiling. Do whatever you want. The main thing is to get out of here.

name: I Think I'm in Love with a Demon Prince
summary: In this tower-defense, visual-novel fantasy game, same-sex love is the only celebrated and embraced love. We follow Kingdom Yurei, home to lesbian angels, as they fight off Kingdom Jomon, with their brooding demonic gay men. Help Princess Tennyo determine her fate!

name: Itadaki Street 2: Neon Sign ha Bara Iro ni
summary: Itadaki Street 2 is the second game in the Itadaki Street series, and the only entry on Super Famicom. It has 14 new boards and 1 returning board, as well as new features such as the casino. This was the first entry published by Enix, and the first to feature elements from the Dragon Quest series.

name: IT Specialist Simulator
summary: Step into the world of IT! Diagnose network issues, manage servers, and repair devices while handling tasks under strict SLAs. Choose your career path, from HelpDesk to IT Project Manager. Develop real IT knowledge and climb the ranks in this realistic IT simulation!

name: Its Village
summary: Take control of a rural village and develop it in any direction you want. You will have many opportunities for development, but you will need to fear the terrible skeletons that will destroy your city.

name: I Think I Need Your Help
summary:
A strange entity has been keeping Vela up at night so she calls her ex, Mira, to help her figure out what's going on, but none of them knew what they were getting themselves into. Together they venture into a forest full of strange creatures to find answers.

The game takes around 20 minutes and was made for Yuri Game Jam 2023.

name: It's John's House
summary: Anomaly-Spotting Horror inside a cursed manor ruled by the twisted lawyer Dr. John Ravenwood, his voice following your every step and decision. Time loops, shifting horrors, and cruel games await. Spot anomalies. Sign his contract… and no, you don’t get another lawyer.

name: I Traveled Back to 5 Days Before the Apocalypse
summary: "I Traveled Back to 5 Days Before the Apocalypse" is a real-time text adventure. After freezing and starving in the apocalypse, you revive five days prior. Now you must stockpile supplies, manage neighbor relations, and survive the impending catastrophe—your choices determine everything.

name: It's A Racing Game
summary:
This is a racing game.
This is an ONLINE racing game.
There are many games like it, but this one is mine.

name: It Returned to the Desert
summary: Unique mix of turn-based strategy and adventure. Defend the town of Glint Rock against radioactive giant ants! Dr. Mill is a geologist that came to town to examine the recent meteor crash. Now he has to convince the towns folk that something's going on.

name: It'sRoachTime!
summary: It'sRoachTime! - is a hardcore, third person 3D online pvp fighting arena game! Fight as a mutant cockroach in real time insect simulator, find your way to survive, destroy them all!

name: It's Dark
summary: There has been a containment breach in a secret facility located deep underground. Experiment E.C.H.O has escaped and is running loose. The lab has gone into shutdown mode, and it's dark...

name: Itadaki Street Special
summary: The game is similar to Monopoly in that players roll one die to advance around a board, purchase an unowned property they land on and earn money when opponents land on the player's property. The game differs from Monopoly in that players can buy and sell stocks of a block, affecting the value of block's stock up by buying or down by selling that block's stock or by developing a player-owned property of that block which increases the value per share for that block's stock. Also unlike Monopoly, it is not necessary to own the entire block to develop a property, though controlling more than one property of a block allows the player to develop their properties into larger buildings to collect more from opponents when they land on them. Players must collect a set of four suits, heart, diamond, clover and spade, to level up and collect additional gold when the pass the starting position/bank. To win a player must make it back to the bank with the board's required amount, which includes the total value of the player's stocks, property value, and gold on hand.

name: It Girl
summary:
It Girl was a fashion-themed social simulation game developed by CrowdStar, a company based in Burlingame, California. Released on Facebook in 2010, the game allowed players to create stylish avatars, shop for clothes, attend parties, date, and climb the social ladder. All in a glamorous virtual world.

Players could spend in-game currency to unlock new outfits, go to like Las Vegas and the Cruise, and compete to become the most fashionable and popular "It Girl" among friends. The game had a unique blend of dress-up mechanics, light RPG elements, and social competition, offering a fun and stylish escape for fans of fashion. Whether it was saving up for the perfect outfit or checking the leaderboard, It Girl had a vibe that stuck with its fans.

In 2012, CrowdStar shifted its focus to mobile platforms, ending development on Facebook titles while continuing to maintain existing games. It Girl remained playable for a while longer, but was officially shut down on November 30, 2013.

While It Girl is no longer around, it lives on in the memories of those who dressed to impress, remembering the thrill of finding the perfect outfit, rising through the ranks, and living their dream lives one pixel at a time. An experience many still wish they could return to, if only for a moment.

name: It Was Beautiful
summary: It Was Beautiful is a heartfelt story about a little fish who decides to witness the mysterious sunset despite facing a terminal illness. With the help of her father, she strives to find meaning and beauty, despite limited time and uncertain paths.

name: It's Summer
summary: Woke up after a midday nap. Country house. Turntable swishing sound. You are 8 years old. It's Summer is an indie video game which genres are “sandbox”, “babushka”, and “midday nap”. The game has neither goal nor sense. Only you, cheap tea bags with russian tears and the endless yellow field.

name: It Takes Many
summary: You've got a Tindermatch! Sadly she lives very far away so you decide to fly to her and take your friends with you! Plays like Super Mario, but you only have a limited amount of restarts. Play with up to 7 people. Reach the End to win the game

name: It Takes the Ball
summary: Be careful! The game may be strongly condemned by dog lovers!Because if you don't play well, the cute dog in the game will die in front of you.Use the mouse to control the pitch of the racket.Waving the racket to control the ball is the trick of this game.

name: It Goes On
summary: It Goes On is a little platformer that attempts to use mechanics as metaphor to explore disability and disempowerment.

name: It's Always Monday
summary:
It's always monday is a first person point and click quest game.
You will play as Bob, Who is trapped in a boring work existence, your goal is to try to find a way to escape the office.

name: It's a Wrap!
summary: It's a Wrap! is a challenging puzzle game about making movies in 1980s Hollywood. Figure out the perfect timing of props, actors, and special effects as the Director. Then jump into the scene as the movie's star in a traditional 2D platformer.

name: Ittzy Fearless
summary: Ittzy Fearless is a difficult physics-based action game. Play as Ittzy the fire spirit and use your swift moves and devastating strikes to tackle chaotic waves of enemies, projectiles and explosions.

name: ItsJustAStory
summary: ItsJustAStory is a solo post-apocalyptic game, it's a story about a doctor and a build-up to the production of the actual game. your goal is to stay alive and find the cure, you play through a series of events with tasks simple to complete. the main focus here is to get the story.

name: Ittle Dew 2
summary:
"Float ashore on a strange island
Ittle and Tippsie crash onto yet another island filled with loot, puzzles and mysterious inhabitants! With the help of a magical map, they set out to steal eight pieces of a raft from increasingly improbable locations including beaches, prairies, an art exhibit and some dude's basement.

Wield magical weapons
Discover four weapons that double as puzzle solving items, and upgrade them by finding additional copies. Secret artifacts abound in the island's many hidden caves, all of which can be found and solved with your starting equipment!

Adventure your own way
Who needs a map, anyway? Tackle the first seven dungeons in any order, and use your items to open various shortcuts within. The craftiest of adventurers have more than one way to open a locked door."

name: It Takes One Year To Beat This Game
summary: Make one billion clicks and spend years to beat the game or show who is a really pro gamer here

name: ITribe
summary: RTS survival in hand paint style. Create your mode you want: quantity enemies, predators, disasters, the need for food or just turn off it for cozy mode

name: Iterum
summary:
Engage in tile-based tactical real-time combat, where every maneuver and flanking action can turn the tide of battle. Position your units carefully to outsmart your opponents and secure victory on the field.

Oversee the survival and prosperity of your city through deep seasonal yield management. Store grain for the winter, adapt to unpredictable hazards, and balance rations, taxes, and happiness to keep your people thriving. High taxes and generous rations can both shape your city's fate, just like in classic survival city-builders.

Build and fortify settlements at key locations, exploit and refine resources, and maintain vital supply lines to support your armies on campaign. Every decision matters as you expand your influence and defend your realm.

Unleash your creativity with a custom script-based map editor. Design your own scenarios, craft unique challenges, or relive historical campaigns from the age of the Roman Empire. Shape the world and the stories you want to play.

name: It Takes a Village
summary: It Takes a Village is a city-building RPG taking inspiration from games like Legend of Zelda and Animal Crossing. Venture into a procedurally generated world filled with monsters, dungeons, and more as you collect resources to build up your village to push back the evil that infests your world.

name: It Has My Face
summary: Kill your clone before it kills YOU! In this roguelite sandbox horror game, experience true paranoia as you hide, hunt, and try to eliminate your double. Fight to survive as you unravel this terrifying tale of clones and biological horrors!

name: Itty Bitty Toilet Kitty
summary: BE A CAT! SAVE YOUR HUMAN! You're a fluffy feline who must save their owner from the hordes of flesh eating greebles which dwell within the bathroom. Will she make it through her morning business alive? Only you can save her!

name: It Lurks Below
summary: It Lurks Below is an action-oriented, survival RPG in a randomly generated world. Fight through the massive underground dungeon, customize your character with random items and find out what evil lurks below.

name: It Stares Back
summary: Explore The Great Tapestry: Once a candy-colored realm of dreams and fantasy, now a corrupted death-scape of perilous ruin. Will you gaze into the void to learn the fate of this tattered land? Be weary, traveler…

name: It's Hot Pot Time!
summary: Take on the Hot Pot Challenge together in co-op or online play for up to 8 players and strive to become the ultimate hot pot champion! Experience the realistic simulation of eating hot pot. Enjoy and relax in an immersive environment. Get your stove ready and savor every moment!

name: It's Mr. Pants
summary: Based on Rare's off-beat mascot, It's Mr. Pants is a traditional puzzle game in the Tetris sense where the challenge is to piece together specific shapes of specific colors on a flat playing field grid. The idea is simple: form rectangles of larger than 3x2 to make them disappear from play. The pieces can be rotated in 90 degree variations, important to get these tiles into the littlest slots on the field. You can't place same colors on top of each other, but you can place other colors on top of already placed shapes to remove them from play. There are three variations: in "Puzzle," the challenge is to remove all shapes from play with the set amount of pieces. In "Wipeout", you've got two minutes to remove all shapes from play with an infinite amount of pieces. And in "Marathon," the challenge is to constantly place and remove shapes as long as you can, trying to keep the session alive as the playfield gets eaten away from the outside in.

name: Italian Brainrot TCG
summary: Italian Brainrot TCG is the chaotic card collector game you never asked for. Earn points passively, buy cursed booster packs, and unlock bizarre Italian brainrot characters and descend into card collecting madness

name: It's Grim Up North
summary: Our hero Terry is enjoying life in God’s own county, Yorkshire, until he makes a shocking discovery. His quaint English village has been invaded by... ALIENS.

name: Iter Vehemens Ad Necem
summary: Fellow adventurer, turn back while you can! For here begins the roguelike Iter Vehemens ad Necem, a Violent Road to Death. If you choose to travel along it, you will dive into countless exciting adventures to gain items of great magic, attain powerful equipment made of mysterious materials, bathe in the blessings of mighty gods and recruit loyal allies of various shapes and sizes. Unfortunately, along the way you will also often be dangerously injured, poisoned, catch numerous diseases, lose several limbs and transform into manifold different kinds of pitiful creatures in the darkest depths of hostile dungeons. And, at the end of the road, you are bound to perish in a most gruesome and painful way. Don't say we didn't warn you.

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No. 1: Definitive Edition!
summary: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No. 1 Definitive Edition is a Sports game, developed by Hal Laboratory and published by Nintendo. It is the Definitive Edition of the Super Famicom game Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No. 1.

name: It's Fine
summary: It’s Fine is an active incremental/upgrade clicker game about releasing v1.0 of your game on time.

name: It Reaches
summary: It Reaches is a first person horror game, captured through the lens of a police officer’s body cam. Trapped inside the facilities of an abandoned hospital, find a way to escape the horrors lurking underground. Uncover a dark mystery left behind and don't get caught! They will reach for you…

name: It's Paper Guy!
summary: It's cute, let's cut!

name: Iteriba: Olokun's Wrath
summary:
Olokun, The Orixá of the Seas and Oceans, has brought his minions and a huge wave to destroy the city of Ilê-Ifé and punish mankind. To save his people and defeat Olokun, the prince of Ilê-Ifé - Okanbi - will need all the help he can get.

Okanbi will be guided to make offerings to the Orixás with flowers and fruits, asking for their help and wisdom in this difficult moment. Some Orixás help his journey with Gifts and Blessings - powers that use the energy present in all things: the Axé. With the power of Axé and the wisdom of the Orixás, Okanbi can defeat the creatures of the deep and stop Olokun's Wrath!

name: It is a Good Knight to Die
summary: Fight your way through hordes of evil in this light-hearted 2D, action-platformer. Traverse and battle your way through deep caves, werewolf filled forests, frigid peaks, and big stompy bosses! Always remember, It Is A Good Knight To Die!

name: It’s Quiz Time: Guinness World Records Edition
summary: The iconic GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS meets It's Quiz Time for the ultimate multiplayer party game. Flex your knowledge on official, mind-blowing records, conquer unique rounds with photo and video questions, and battle your friends locally and online all using your phone as a controller!

name: IT Clicker: Dinosaur in the Code World
summary: Welcome to the thrilling world of the IT industry! In our game, "IT Clicker: Dinosaur in the Code World," anyone can try their hand at being an IT whiz. We'll show you just how easy and fun it is to make money in the world of IT.

name: It Comes in Waves
summary: A minimalist, experimental open-world adventure about guilt and grief. Explore, shoot, scavenge and bring a specimen to The Sanctuary.

name: It's Breaking Out
summary: Get ready to unravel the secrets of an ancient, mysterious box in this card-based roguelike game that is inspired by the work of H. P. Lovecraft. Collect unique decks as you dive deep into the cosmic horror, with each roll of the dice bringing you closer to the truth and madness.

name: It Takes Two
summary: Embark on the craziest journey of your life in It Takes Two, a genre-bending platform adventure created purely for co-op. Invite a friend to join for free with Friend’s Pass and work together across a huge variety of gleefully disruptive gameplay challenges. Play as the clashing couple Cody and May, two humans turned into dolls by a magic spell. It is late at night and the sky is as black as pitch.

The trees which surround you, jutting out of the earth like eerie monuments to a foreign god, are blotting out most of the moonlight.

You do not know where you are going.

You have no map; no route; no plan.

You have no desire, as you run, save to escape.

You cannot let yourself be caught.

All you can do is run, on and on and on...

But, despite all of your hard work, your best efforts will, invariably, be in vain. It’s already too late for you. After all...

You’ll never be able to escape from me.

Children jump right into a drawing adventure with friendly animals that are ready to play and help them learn to read!  Using Living Ink – Sabi’s unique drawing recognition system - kid's drawings become one-of-a kind interactive objects that form the centerpiece of the game's action.  
 
Crafted especially for early-readers, the game play is designed to provide a new way for children to practice reading and creative problem solving skills. New methods to engage children in learning, discovered during a multi-year research project conducted by Microsoft Corporation, are fused into the game's design, yielding a unique experience that enhances self-confidence and encourages fun and learning. The game provides a totally unique experience every time it is played. Since the environment is created through each player's personal drawings, the possibilities are as endless and fantastic as your child's imagination.

It is as if you were doing work is a work of speculative play, presenting a vision of a possible/near-future in the form of an application that helps people pretend they’re doing standard-issue computer work. Jump in an answer emails, write documents, click check boxes, and so much more!

Can Piquet and his friends, who have become heroes by chance, prevent the mysterious sleeping sickness that is putting the kingdom in danger and prevent the resurrection of the evil wizard?
The story progresses as you collect items which you can get with magic, by combining them together, and then level up the items themselves. There are over 1,000 items.
The game is divided into an adventure part where the story unfolds in 15 chapters, and an RPG part where you control the characters and fight monsters.

name: ItzaBitza
summary:
In the award winning game ItzaBitza , drawings truly come to life.   Kids help their Sketchy by using Living Ink - a unique drawing recognition system – to draw one-of-a kind interactive objects that form the centerpiece of the game's action.   Draw a house and watch the character shrink to fit in the door; draw flames and watch the rocket ship they drew blast off.   
 
The game provides a totally unique experience every time it is played. Since the environment is created through each player's personal drawings, the possibilities are as endless and fantastic as the player’s imagination.  The game comes with five themed playsets – "Home Sweet Home", "Let’s go Camping", "Play in Space", "A Farm Life", and perfect for Halloween – "A VERY Scary Haunted House."  Players unlock playsets by winning star challenges. 
							ItzaBitza is more than just a fun game.  The game has been crafted specifically for early-readers.  In ItzaBitza, players who are just learning to read start out having a blast watching the whimsical reactions happen between their drawings and their Sketchy.  Then all of a sudden, they need to read to win a star.  Or to know what to draw so they can help their Sketchy.   Parents will be delighted by the game's ability to enhance their child's self-confidence. Unlike some games that leave younger players frustrated by their difficulty and lack of assistance, ItzaBitza provides features to guide children even when faced with unfamiliar concepts. If an early-reader encounters a new word, it can be read aloud to them with the simple act of hovering the mouse over the word.  
							Through a delightful twist on drawing games, ItzaBitza introduces a new way for kids to game and while they are playing, really important learning is happening.  New methods to engage children, discovered during a multi-year research project conducted by Microsoft Corporation, are fused into the game's design, yielding a unique experience that encourages fun and learning.

The ball sticks to the feet of the players, who can be tackled either by doing a block tackle or attempting a slide tackle, which risks giving away a foul. summary: It Happened At Night is a short horror game where the player must complete basic objectives to advance the story and immerse themselves through the eyes of the protagonist.

name: Italian Journey
summary: Join this Italian Journey thorough Italy in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Itazura Tenshi
summary:
Control an angel and connect the stars to complete the constellation.
Various enemies that get in the way can be defeated using the bow.
When all the constellations are completed, RAN and LUM will appear.
Make them hug well to get a bonus.

name: It Takes Two Girls
summary: Who would refuse the request of two beautiful girls to travel together~

name: It Belongs in a Museum
summary: It Belongs in a Museum is a Rogue-lite, treasure hunting, artifact collection VR story game. Join a shadow organization and help its weakened, resurrected goddess search for magic treasures to undo the curse they unleashed in procedural dungeons, tombs, lost cities, and ancient ruins.

name: It Lives
summary: It Lives is a singleplayer map made for Duke Nukem 3d, more specifically for its Eduke32 port. Be sure to set your video setups in software mode before playing.

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1: Natsu no Zenkoku Tournament
summary: A SoundLink game using "糸井重里のバス釣りNo.1 (Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1)". Only players who own the "Bass Tsuri No.1" game can participate in the event, otherwise the player participates in the garbage-picking-up event. The players compete for total weight of five basses. 100 higher-ranking winners qualify for the final tournament. Shigesato Itoi, bass professional Kawabe, Ogimori Jyunko Hagimori, and Kyoko Koizumi appeared on the event.

name: It Consumes
summary: It Consumes is a roguelite arena-FPS in the dark. See by beating your heart and kill demons shrouded in shadows. Upgrade your abilities, unlock new weapons, and conquer what lurks in the darkness.

name: It's Still a Space Thing
summary:
Your space base is under attack! Evil bosses and minions have taken over!
Gear up with special attacks and enhancements to rid your home of menacing machines.
You are the lone wolf, tasked with this mission.

name: It's all in your mind
summary: This experience has no plot. If you find one, it's all in your mind.

name: It's Time
summary: Just so there’s no temporal confusion, “It’s Time” is a classic point and click adventure game, that focuses on Time Travel. As the lead operative in a shadowy government organization, you’ll be travelling back in time completing different missions and objectives. Every mission is unique, and you could be doing anything from analyzing an event, to actually messing around with them and changing the past!

name: It's good to be a pirate
summary: "Suzaku Fly VR" is a casual game of simulation perfect to have a good time, you can also play it in VR mode!

name: It Came from the Desert
summary:
It Came from the Desert is an unreleased Sega Mega Drive game developed by Cinemaware, and was due to be published by Electronic Arts in 1992. Though it shares a similar intro, it is in fact an entirely different game from other versions of It Came from the Desert released for the IBM PC, Amiga and TurboGrafx-CD, being a top-down action game rather than a point and click adventure.

According to programmer Matthew Harmon (brought in from New World Computing), the game was "99.99%" complete before cancellation, citing a rare bug which caused the game to crash as the reason the game was not complete. He also suggests that the reason the game was axed was due to EA's policy to concentrate more on sports titles (though it quickly backed away from this strategy). The game was shown at the Winter CES 1992. Cinemaware released the "99.99%" finished prototype ROM of the game as freeware on 2001-12-17.

name: It Lives Beneath
summary: It Lives Beneath is the second and last book of the It Lives series. It succeeds its first book, It Lives In The Woods.

name: It's Only Rock 'N Roll
summary: In this brilliant text and graphics game, you start with a guitar, a few bucks and enough raw talent to sit in with the Stones or the Police. Now you've got some big decisions to make as you pick one of three levels and let IT'S ONLY ROCK 'N ROLL take you down a whirlwind road seeking the unbelievable wealth, status and popularity points you'll need to succeed. If you're really good if you can avoid exhausting tours, bad managers. lousy material and too much fun — if you can keep your money, stay happy, and interpret the record charts and newspaper headlines — you'll be the all time reigning KING OF ROCK AND ROLL! Fail and you'll be playing the opening act blues. But whether you end up a superstar or a has-been, ITS ONLY ROCK 'N ROLL AND YOU'LL LIKE IT! LOVE IT! YES YOU WILL!

name: It Knows You're Here
summary: Small horror game with an adaptive AI Director!

name: Itsuka, Kasanariau Ashita he: Sayuri-hen
summary: Itsuka, Kasanariau Ashita he: Sayuri-hen is a Strategy game, developed by MBA International and published by Sony Music Entertainment Incorporated, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Itch!
summary:
Itch! is a puzzle game with simple rules, intuitive controls and tricky puzzles. 
 
The game principle is to simply arrange four equally colored fleas side by side in a straight line or square pattern for points. New fleas are born continuously, and you must keep pace with population growth. Every level reached makes your quest still tougher. 
 
The game features 3 different playing modes (Time Game, Round Game, Puzzle Game).

name: Ittle Dew no Densetsu: Ushinawareta Reta Shima to Nazo no Shiro
It Feeds
summary: An adventurer embarks on a dangerous quest.

name: It follows you
summary: You are all alone in this dark and frightening place. Run and hide, hurry to find a way out, because it follows you...

name: It Started With Hairs
summary:
A 5-10 minute visual novel about the horror of having a body.

Content Warnings for descriptions of body horror and self harm.

name: It's Dark Inside
summary: It's Dark inside is a turn-and-tile-based, Horror Adventure where you play as a Mother setting out to save her child by killing a horrific God from the inside. Carefully plan out your every move in this game, for every action will be met with wrath from the creatures that lurk inside.

name: Itrill
summary:
You may become a string player or music conductor...
This game added both western and eastern music. Besides, you can also play with your own iPod music.It brings you entirely new experience with more fun.

name: It's Barbaric: Euroza
summary: Lead a brutal force of loyal followers to explore the continent of Euroza! Build a settlement and defenses while recruiting and promoting your soldiers. Use unique tactics and command your forces to conquer all the Euroza, defeat its ruling king and become the new barbarian king!

name: Itako Works
summary: A short horror comedy work using the machine voice "VOICEROID"

name: It's a Giant!
summary: Have fun being big!

name: It Depends
summary:
A story about choices and discoveries.

When an ordinary night becomes not so ordinary, the four friends who have been living together in an orphanage all their lives - Tyler, Ken, Maisie, and Sophia - have to react. Their lives, the world, and everything else is about to change, and it all depends on what they choose to do.

Every little decision matters, but you will never know what it leads to, and there is no going back to change it; what's done is done.

name: It's Adoorable
summary: A lovely one-minute minigame

name: It's possible
summary: Squeeze past buzzsaws, dodge deadly spikes, and jump over burning acid in this challenging indie platformer made with love!

name: Itsuka Todoku, Ano Sora Ni
summary:
In this town, there are "clouds" covering the nightsky, that the starlight won't even pierce. Because of this, constellations would always be too far.

Born and raised in the Tatsumi noble family, Saku has failed to meet the expectations that lie on every member of the family.

One day, Saku receives word from his strict grandfather, "Someone has to head to that town as a representative of Tatsumi family." He was the first to raise his hand and volunteer.

Estranged by his family, Saku travels to the estate of Koumeishi, a town that has never seen the stars.

He went without hardly making sure of the details of arrangements for a wedding...

name: It's Not You, It's Your Trauma
summary: The world's most prosaic isekai. Stuck in an unfamiliar world inside a library that records the entirety of its history through mysteriously magical means, Sammy Baxa must... dust the shelves? Well, at least she's got a friend to accompany her while she waits for a way back home.

name: It's Real And It Kills
summary: 9 old school vanilla maps featuring Castlevania music and Realm667 textures.

name: I Told You So!
summary: Welcome to Tara's webshow, the prime choice for all things spooky and fun!

name: It's Slime-Creep Time!
summary: It's Slime-Creep time is a simple 2d-puzzle casual game. Set out with 1 of several soldier-like class-types. Destroy aliens with guns. Advance with new gear and different skills later on. Be the destructive renegade needed to save what is still remnant onto the earth.

name: It Lives Within
summary: You're finally ready to leave your past behind and move on. But apparently, moving on means enrolling at a community college in a supernatural town overflowing with monsters and dark magic...

name: It Lurks!
summary: Take on the role of a hardened Private Detective in this horror themed classic-styled Role Playing Game that pits you against fearsome foes in an exciting turn-based and interactive battle-system.

name: It's Skrot-Robot Time!
summary: It's Skrot-Robot time is a simple 2d-puzzle casual game. Set out with 1 of several soldier-like class-types. Obliterate robots with guns. Upgrade with new gear and different skills later on. Be the resistance fighter needed to stand off against the devastating skrot-konstrukts.

name: Italian Journey: Nitro
summary: Join this Italian Journey thorough the Italy in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Itsutsu no Neito+
summary: A free single-player RPG that you can enjoy from start to finish! A hearty story with an in -depth battle system!

name: Itsuka, Kasanariau Ashita he: Shirou-hen
summary: Itsuka, Kasanariau Ashita e: Shirou-hen is a Strategy game, developed by MBA International and published by Sony Music Entertainment Incorporated, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Itro: In the Right Order
summary: Tap icons in the order they originally appeared with each round adding a new one to the mix.

name: Itsy
summary: Itsy is a heart tug the length of a bus ride. A narrative climb up the waterspout about the struggles of Autism-burnout. Play for story (progress saves), or endlessly & conquer the leaderboard. You ever felt endlessly stuck? So has the Itsy Bitsy Spider. Together, can you both help him out of it?

name: Italo-Doom
summary: Italo-Doom is a 20-map megawad for Doom II created by Zach Stephens (Ribbiks) and Daniel Jakobsson (dannebubinga) and released in January 2016. It has a reputation for being extremely difficult, with slaughter maps and other challenges. One difficulty guide states that "each map is brutally crushing and will take a lot of grinding to beat." It's also notable for all maps being named after italo disco songs.

name: It's Full of Stars
summary: It's Full of Stars is a Battle Royale game in which you fight for a ridiculous enormous amount of gold and power... oh! and also for surviving. Basically only the winner lives... Definitely not based on any korean tv shows or other similar games.

name: It Comes Around - A Kinetic Novel
summary:
As seen in Singapore's Doujima, Glass of Water Studios is proud to present It Comes Around, born from a partnership between Glass of Water Studios as well as Afterthought Studios (Forgotten,Not Lost & A More Beautiful World)

A ritual to solve the mysterious death of a schoolmate goes horribly wrong, trapping the students and teachers of the Sugimori Occult Club in a horrible game of cat and mouse.

Who will survive this nightmarish hell?

name: It's Locked
summary: A horror game about fumbling with a bunch of keys to try escaping a pursuing monster though a series of locked doors

name: It's A War Out There 2
summary: Caleb finds an axe zombie carelessly wandering around a cliff-face, falling to its death. Caleb figures this must herald a nearby Cabal stronghold, and so he decides to check it out, again to relieve his endless boredom. First he comes across an old library, which he blasts through, before retreating down into the sewers, and again through a laboratory, finding a similar portal that leads out into a lava temple. There he has a surprise encounter with Tchernobog, whom he defeats before once again heading along his way.

name: Iterria Zone
summary: Iterria Zone - Horde destroying game. First-person Shooter, Survival, Horror

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1: Fuyu no Zenkoku Tournament
summary: A SoundLink game using "糸井重里のバス釣りNo.1 (Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1)". Only players who own the "Bass Tsuri No.1" game can participate in the event, otherwise the player participates in the garbage-picking-up event. The players compete for total weight of five basses. 100 higher-ranking winners qualify for the final tournament. Shigesato Itoi, bass professional Kawabe, Ogimori Jyunko Hagimori, and Kyoko Koizumi appeared on the event.

name: It's Raining Cats' & Dogs' Poop 2
summary: The literal crapstorm versus birds continues.

name: It Only Gets Worse
summary: It Only Gets Worse is a jokewad for Doom II and the ZDoom source port by Wills. It was uploaded to the /idgames archive on July 6, 2007, and received the Mockaward at that year's Cacowards.

name: It Takes Two to Tangle
summary: It Takes Two to Tangle is a 2024 King's Quest fan game release. It is an unofficial follow-up to King's Quest VIII and continues the story of Queen Cassima, wife of King Alexander and Prince Edgar, lover of Princess Rosella on a long, perplexing journey which will ultimately decide the fate of both themselves and their loved ones.

name: Item Collector Ball
summary: You're a ball that collects items! Explore this carefully crafted time trial platformer with a plethora of unique physics based obstacles. Unique music and retro aesthetic define this game and provide a relaxing and satisfying experience. Easy to pick up but challenging to master.

name: It Fishes At Night
summary:
IT FISHES AT NIGHT is a short, story based retro horror game about fishing. On your way to catch the big fish you've always wanted to snag, you meet a strange fisherman who quickly becomes a problem.

Can you escape?

name: It Happened Here: Beacon of Truth - Collector's Edition
summary: Dive into a cold case of murder and betrayal at a lighthouse!

name: Itareri Zukuseri
summary: A one-dimensional roguelike RPG set in the nightlife of Ueno, Tokyo in the early 2000s. Can you cope with the chaotic inhabitants of the night?

name: It's a Block-Pushing Game
summary: Push block? Push block! Block-pushing! Push! Block! Push! Block! Push! Push!

name: It's Our Revolution
summary:
It's Our Revolution! is a freeware "puzzle RPG" by Wood Penguin made in RPG Maker VX Ace.

The goal of the game is for the unheard youth to gather a following to sway the king. Unfortunately, as your ensemble grows, you'll find it becomes a little difficult to get around...

name: It sucks, y'know
summary:
A short game about you and your mom.

But instead of feeling like home, why does it feel like the opposite instead?

name: Itchana Tchones Zombie Terror
summary:
In Itchana Tchones: Zombie Terror, it's Halloween Eve and the inhabitants of a small village are terrified by screams coming from a cave located in an old Indian cemetery. Those who entered the cave, to try to find out what was happening, mysteriously disappeared.

The city mayor then decided to call Itchana Tchones so that he could fight against this terror and return serenity to the village.

name: It's OK to Fail
summary: "It's OK to Fail" is a difficult silly physics-based platform game where your ultimate goal is to reach the end in under 15 minutes. Control your arms and your legs to jump and overtake your fails !

name: I Think the Waves are Watching Me
summary: A game written by Bob McCabe for the 21st Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: It Moves
summary: It Moves is a horror game that will try to scare you without too many of the typical "screamers", instead relying on atmosphere and suspense. You'll be solving puzzles along the way, and encountering all manner of not-so-friendly creatures.

name: I Think You Should Marble
summary: I think You Should Marble is collection of 10 Marble Themed maps with different color combinations and themes.

name: It's a Dog's Love
summary: You expect your new job at Heaven, a famous pet store in Tokyo, will be pretty straightforward -- until you discover your handsome co-workers are actually half-dogs with the ability to transform at will! Dobe, Shephe, and Bernar entrust their secret to you, and you soon find family in the pack at Heaven… but not all is peaceful. When a rival pet shop sends thugs to destroy the store, you’re forced to stand your ground and defend your new home alongside your friends.

name: It Goes Away in the End
summary: This map was cre﻿ated as experiment to learn about eternity engine and mapping by Misty.

name: It's Either Them Or Us
summary:
But lately all the roots from your garden have grown,
They cut through my skin, they broke my heart
and all I have left are bones.

name: It Could Have Been Me
summary: A journey from Afganistan to Sweden. Experience 26 documentary stories and 5 surreal worlds in VR. Rap from Emilia Carapic (Bac Nini)Voices from experiencers during the Night of Culture in Lund, where over 80 people tried the experience:"The coolest thing I've seen!

name: It's a Trap
summary: Can you survive the deadly traps in unexplored catacombs? Reclaim the legendary Crystal of Truth before the Nazis and you will see the world differently. Test your wisdom, courage and moves in a real challenge. Only for HTC Vive.

name: It's Always Sunny: The Gang Goes Mobile
summary:
A simulation freemium mobile game for iOS and Android, based on It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia.

Tap your way through the worst bar in Philadelphia! Team up with The Gang from It's Always Sunny -- Mac, Dennis, Charlie, Dee, and Frank -- the hilariously dysfunctional, self-obsessed group of friends, and start schemes to launder Frank's dirty money.

name: It Lives in the Woods
summary: It Lives In The Woods is the first book of the It Lives series. It is followed by It Lives Beneath.

name: IT Startup: Tech Fodder
summary: A dev themed Roguelike Deckbuilder. Play Developer Cards to gain project points. Raise your DEV’s efficiency with Knowledge Cards. Sabotage your opponents or steal their Developers. Craft a unique deck and squeeze out your employees to win the next Project Battle!

name: It Happened Here: Streaming Lives
summary: Are you ready, detective? Step into a tale of mystery, intrigue, deceit, and murder!

name: It's on You
summary: It's On You is an FMV game in which your choices will affect the outcome of Curtis and those around him. The latter caught between a world of crime and violence, in the wake of a gang taking control of the community and a potential career as an international footballer.

name: Itadaki Smash
summary: Itadaki Smash is a Beat 'em Up game that pays tribute to the classics of the genre. Gain new skills and revive the spirit of the arcade by unleashing an arsenal of combos, throws and special attacks.

name: Itsu no Ma ni Koukan Nikki
It's Six Random Characters and a Single Floor Dungeon: That's the Whole Game
summary: 'It's Six Random Characters and a Single Floor Dungeon, That's the Whole Game' is a first person dungeon crawler. You start with a team of 6 random characters, and try to make your way through a single labyrinth. Each character has a Class and Race that influence them at the start, and you can find things along the way as you try and reach the exit. There are 105 classes and 28 races, but only 4 races per class for a total of 420 characters.

name: Item Tower
summary: "Item Tower" is a unique game that turns the mundane into an exciting challenge. Players build towers by expertly arranging a variety of everyday items - from chairs and bananas to microwaves, washing machines, and statues. The challenge lies in balancing these unpredictable pieces. Stacking up 10 items gives your tower stability, but watch out! Any less and your tower could come crashing down. Stack up 50 items and watch your tower magically disappear, leaving behind your well-earned points. Competition escalates with an online leaderboard, as players from around the world vie to amass the most points in this whimsical, strategic game. Step into "Item Tower" and elevate ordinary objects into extraordinary adventures!

name: It Came From Space, and Ate Our Brains
summary: ‘It came from space, and ate our brains’ is an Arcade top down shooter with horde survival gameplay. The brain slurping aliens are only vulnerable to bullets. Using your flashlight, environment and special powers you have a better chance to take care of the unwanted pink guests. Triangle Studios focused on creating a unique atmospheric setting, addicting and straightforward gameplay, which can be played cooperatively

name: Its Simple, Shoot
summary: Its Simple, Shoot! Is a minimalist top down 2D wave shooter that has the player utilizing various weapons and abilities to overcome their foes.
